entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tillsonburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Delhi 5:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 51 %
Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: NNW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle in the evening and ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
